name: Bane
help: Spreads A Target's Bio, Bio II, And Miasma To Nearby Enemies.  Potency Is Halved For The Fourth Enemy And Beyond.  Duration: Time Remaining On Original Effect  Additional Effect: 15% Chance That Bio, Bio II, And Miasma Duration Resets If Shorter Than Original Effect Duration Additional Effect: Aethertrail Attunement Only Available When Under The Effect Of Aetherflow.
json: Spreads a target's Bio, Bio II, and Miasma to nearby enemies.  Potency is halved for the fourth enemy and beyond.  Duration: Time remaining on original effect  Additional Effect: 15% chance that Bio, Bio II, and Miasma duration resets if shorter than original effect duration
Only available when under the effect of Aetherflow.
